title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, July 4, 2020
description: On this day in 1855, Walt Whitman published the first edition of “Leaves of Grass.” It was met with glowing reviews, many penned by Whitman himself.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day in 1855, Walt Whitman published the first edition of “Leaves of Grass.” It was met with glowing reviews, many penned by Whitman himself.
